answers.answer: I'd hate to go to er and be their hour ends and everything check out okay
Anything anyone I just took shower but it seemed to just make the pain worse

If your pain is so severe that you're crying, you need to be seen. Preeclampsia is high blood pressure (140/90 and above) with protein in your urine. Swelling is a normal part of pregnancy unless you develop sudden, severe swelling overnight.

Well the pain is still bad on my left side I just tried laying on my left laid for a few then all sudden I'm unable to breathe again and only comfortable position is on my right side which is also  giving me of and on unable to breathe
I was also diagnosed with a heart murmur when I was little but Idk what kind and the pain is really close to my heart?

Preeclampsia is very serious so if you have any doubt, I'd get checked.  It is better to be safe than sorry.  You probably don't and shouldn't go through ER.  You would probably go to labor and delivery and get checked there.  You won't wait there.

Here in NC they made me wait for 3 hours then I had to wait 10mind for someone to get me then 30 mind for a doctor to come in room put monitor on me and they ended up keeping me over night cause it was so late the hospital down Here just take advantage of people and their money or Medicaid benefits was really stupid
Baby had been super active just my breathing is really worrying me and this chest pain

Hey.!! I had preclampsia my last pregnancy about two tears ago... It hurt to walk I was soooi swollen. About two weeks before my due date I was going into work but I couldn't bend my ankles enuff to walk from being so swollen. Anyway I called my doctor he told me to put my feet up for an hour an call back if the swelling didn't go down..it didn't so he told me to go in immediately. As soon as I got there he checked me and rushed me into emergency labor..  I would suggest to keep ur doctor posted at all times. Goodluck!

You need to at least call your ob even if its after hours and let them know what's going on. Pain associated with preeclampsia is generally felt in the upper right quadrant of your abdomen (right below the breast) and in your shoulder. Chest pain sounds like you may be experiencing tachycardia especially since you have a heart murmur. If you don't want to be seen in the hospital tonight, you at least need to call your doctor.

Bou1985, I would love to pick your brain. I am only 25 weeks but looking at possible preclampsia when I get into 3rd trimester. I have so many questions! Woofie, from the research ive done I think ur bp has to be much higher than what ur currently experiencing. But u definitely need to be looked at to make sure u are okay.

I had preeclampsia when pg with my dd. I was admitted to l&d in labor with a bp of 150/100 and I had protein in my urine. I never really got swollen, but I had horrible pain in my upper right quadrant and was nauseated more so than normal.

I developed preeclampsia with my son, my hands, ankles, and face were soo swollen I was embaressed lol. I suspected the swelling was getting a bit out of hand so I made a dr appt and my BP was 180/110, and I had protein in my urine so I had to be induced right away...however besides the swelling I really didnt feel sick, no headaches, no problems walking due to swelling, no vision problems. So personally I know you might not feel any different even if you do have preeclampsia, so just be checked out to make sure :)

question: Hello everyone I'm 36 weeks pregnant an I haven't had any problem through this pregnancy no morning sickness or headache just pains an aches and killer heart burn well last night I been noticing the farther along I'm getting my feet are swelling and hanD's and if I walk the soles of my feet hurt so badly even to bend my toes, my hands aren't as bad, my baby has dropped I'm guessing she has as I was checked for dilation at 35 weeks and I wasn't dilating or anything he said she was head down he could feel her head then after that appointment I've been have swelling in feet and hands more than normal I been unable to sleep any position no matter how many pillows I have on me or around me lol but last night was worst I have ever had been suffering from little slight headaches I can feel them when I shake my head a little and my vision is slightly been blurred I was using bathroom about every 10mins now I don't have to go but every 35mins and it's hard for me to breathe feels like someone is grabbing should of my lungs as I try to breath the pain hurts when I walk,move position try to move my arms or anything like that on my left side but it's now effecting my right side when I move my right arm hurt my left chest the pain is so bad I'm crying and I've apply pressure only way I can get it to go away  but one sudden move I'm in pain again and Ik it's not my baby feet cause I can make her move them by pressing on her feet in my ribs the pain is located right under my breasts *** nd been slightly dizzy and feeling sick to my stomach and the middle part where my stomach is feels really tight hurts to pressure on it and I just want advice my eyes are super heavy feeling and getting black rings under them I think I might go to er but just want advice from u guysvif this is normal. Or preclampsia BTW on 27 my bp was 127/ something but they said looked good I'm normally 110-117 from 12 Nov I was 205 pounds then I went to 211 pounds on 27
title: possible preclampsia???
